name: Custom Star Models
author: OliviaFer
description:
Sets the model IDs for the Star, Transparent Star and the Red Coin Marker.

NOTES:
- To avoid graphical issues or crashes, the model IDs used MUST exist in every level with a Star.
- Does not modify Star Select, Klepto or Unagi.

properties.name: Star Model ID
properties.label: STAR
properties.description: The model ID used for the regular Star.

properties.name: Transparent Star Model ID
properties.label: TRANSPARENT_STAR
properties.description: The model ID used for the Transparent Star.

properties.name: Red Coin Marker Model ID
properties.label: MARKER
properties.description: The model ID used for the Red Coin Marker.
